meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Fire Risk Underestimated A National Park Service plan for what has become the largest fire in the history of New Mexico had found only a moderate risk that the blaze would escape its intended boundaries.
Dominican Declares Victory Hipolito Mejia declared himself the winner in the presidential race, vowing that the Dominican Republic's poor would no longer be bystanders to an economic boom.

Fire Risk Underestimated A National Park Service plan for what has become the largest fire in the history of New Mexico had found only a moderate risk that the blaze would escape its intended boundaries.
Dominican Declares Victory Hipolito Mejia declared himself the winner in the presidential race, vowing that the Dominican Republic's poor would no longer be bystanders to an economic boom.
Mental Health Law Ignored Investigators say thousands of employers are violating a law requiring the level of insurance coverage for mental illness to be similar to that for physical illness.

Serbia Seizes TV Station The government in Belgrade took control of the main opposition television station, and the surprised leaders of the opposition began talking of outright dictatorship under President Slobodan Milosevic.
War Moves Deeper in Eritrea As their two-year war moved away from the border, Ethiopia sent dozens of tanks and thousands of troops deeper into Eritrea to try to seize control of a strategic town.
U.S. Replies to Microsoft In a reply to arguments submitted by Microsoft against a proposed breakup, the Justice Department filed court documents standing behind its proposal.
